frontmatter.title: Jean jacket rock
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of a Pao T. drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

node.excerpt:
It’s been a lot of fun drawing the faces of strangers. But you know what’s even better’? Having strangers draw you in return.

If you have an iOS device I encourage you to download the free Sktchy app. You don’t have to be an artist to use it — in fact most using the app aren’t. You just need to upload a selfie or two and…
